      static boolean isLeapDay(java.util.Date date)
      Return whether the specified date is a leap day.
      static int lengthOfMonth(java.util.Date date)
      Determine the number of days in the month within which the date falls.
      static java.util.Date makeNonLeapDate(java.util.Date date)
      Ensure that the date is not a leap day by decrementing the specified date by one day if it is leap day otherwise return the specified date as is.
      static java.util.Date makeNonLeapDate(java.util.Date date, int dayOffset)
      Ensure that the date is not a leap day by offsetting the specified date by the specified dayOffset (positive or negative) if it is leap day otherwise return the specified date as is.

      • makeNonLeapDate

        public static java.util.Date makeNonLeapDate(java.util.Date date)
        Ensure that the date is not a leap day by decrementing the specified date by one day if it is leap day otherwise return the specified date as is.
        Parameters:
        date - The specified date that should not be a leap day.
        Returns:
        The non-leap day date.

      • makeNonLeapDate

        public static java.util.Date makeNonLeapDate(java.util.Date date,
                                             int dayOffset)
        Ensure that the date is not a leap day by offsetting the specified date by the specified dayOffset (positive or negative) if it is leap day otherwise return the specified date as is.
        Parameters:
        date - The specified date that should not be a leap day.
        dayOffset - The number of days to offset the date if it is a leap day.
        Returns:
        The non-leap day date.
